OOBE.oobe_setting_allow_notifications_sub_tit: Let Quantum send helpful updates & reminder (Optional)

OOBE.oobe_setting_allow_microphone_sub_title_: Enables you to interact with Quantum using your voice and wake it up hands-free (Optional)
